original_text: Then Jesus took a cup. He thanked God for the wine in the cup. Then he gave the cup to them and they all drank from it.
korean_text: 또 잔을 가지사 감사 기도 하시고 그들에게 주시니 다 이를 마시매

sentences.original_text: He thanked God for the wine in the cup.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 잔에 있는 포도주에 대해 하나님께 감사했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he gave the cup to them
and they all drank from it.
